${ModID}:AcidicSpray.NAME: Acidic Spray
${ModID}:AcidicSpray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each debuff on the target. NL Apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:PoisonMastery.NAME: Poison Mastery
${ModID}:PoisonMastery.DESCRIPTION: Increase HP loss from Poison by 100%. NL Gain a *Poison *Potion.
${ModID}:PoisonMastery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase HP loss from Poison by 100%. NL Gain !M! *Poison *Potions.

${ModID}:Cannonball.NAME: Cannonball
${ModID}:Cannonball.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:CaptainsCabin.NAME: Captain's Cabin
${ModID}:CaptainsCabin.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Gain !M! *Cannonball.
${ModID}:CaptainsCabin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Gain !M! *Cannonballs.

${ModID}:TerrorOfTheSeas.NAME: Terror of the Seas
${ModID}:TerrorOfTheSeas.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Ruin to ALL enemies. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:MassProduction.NAME: Mass Production
${ModID}:MassProduction.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your draw pile. Exhaust your hand and replace it with copies of that card. 消耗 。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to Mass Produce.

${ModID}:ScrapCannon.NAME: Scrap Cannon
${ModID}:ScrapCannon.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Exhaust a card.

${ModID}:OverTime.NAME: Over Time
${ModID}:OverTime.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL For each card that you've *Exhausted this combat, increase damage by !M!.

${ModID}:SlimeSpray.NAME: Slime Spray
${ModID}:SlimeSpray.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage, apply !M! Poison, and apply Slow to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:StickStrike.NAME: Stick Strike
${ModID}:StickStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Shuffle a *Stick into your draw pile.
${ModID}:StickStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Shuffle a *Stick+ into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Stick.NAME: Stick
${ModID}:Stick.DESCRIPTION: *Stick *Strikes deal !M! more damage this combat. Return the last-played one to your hand. 消耗 。
